thread.title: Perfect position, terrific stay , good value
thread.title_full: Perfect position, terrific stay , good value - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Wrinklyrocker
title: Perfect position, terrific stay , good value
text: Two night weekend stay in March 2017 and it was spot on. Five minutes walk from Houses of Parliament,Big Ben etc close to the the Thames ten minutes walk from Pimlico tube station. Two minutes from bus stops. A Queen double room clean spacious excellent facilities shower etc. Only minor issue there was no TV it was an Apple computer which doubles as a TV. Â£133 per night Inc all you can eat buffet breakfast.
